<script type="text/javascript">    
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
        var voucherData = PH.cookie.get("voucher_notification");                
        if (voucherData){            
            try{
                voucherData = decodeURIComponent(voucherData).replace(/\+/g, ' ');
                voucherData = JSON.parse(voucherData);

                if (voucherData.id && EM.show_voucher_notification_in_page) {
                    EM.AdminNotificationsManager.disableNotificationForShown(voucherData.id);
                }

                var voucherNotificationMsg = voucherData.message,
                    notificationName = voucherData.name;
                
                new EM.Notification({
                    position: 'top right',
                    message : voucherNotificationMsg,
                    icon: 'em em-voucher',
                    ttl: false,
                    className: 'voucher-response-notification',
                    onOpen: function(e){
                        var trackingString = "";
                        if (voucherData.id){
                            trackingString += voucherData.id+'_';
                        }
                        if (voucherData.campaign_id){
                            trackingString += voucherData.campaign_id+'_';
                        }
                        if (notificationName){
                            trackingString += notificationName;
                        }
                        dataLayer.push({event: 'voucher_tooltip_click', ec: "ToolTip", ea: "campanie_"+trackingString, el: "Display campanie_" + trackingString});                        
                    }
                });

                PH.cookie.set('voucher_notification','',-1,'/',window.cookie_domain || EM.cookie_domain);
            }catch(e){
            }
        }        
    })
</script>

<script>
(function() {
    if (!EM.is_logged_in) return;
    var a = document.querySelector('#my_account');
    a.setAttribute('href', '/user/myaccount?ref=ua_personal_data');
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        var i = a.querySelector('.navbar-icon');
        i.replaceWith(PH.node(EM.TMPL.exec('@Components/NavbarDropdowns/avatar.html.twig', {
            user_avatar: EM.user_avatar,
            has_club_membership: EM.user_data && EM.user_data.has_club_membership
        })));
    });
})();
</script>

                    </span><span class="table-cell">Dăruiește un voucher eMAG </span></a>
            </div><script type="text/html">Fă-le o surpriză celor dragi și oferă-le un voucher cadou cu care să își cumpere exact ce își doresc!<div class="pad-top-xs">
                        <a href="https://www.emag.ro/voucher/gift-card?ref=benefits_1_5">Vezi mai multe detalii</a>
                    </div></script></div>
</div>
</section>

                            <div class="ph-scroller">
                <div class="ph-body"><div class="card-item js-card-item pricing-old_preserve-space" data-name="Sistem Desktop PC Gaming Serioux Powered by ASUS cu procesor Intel® Core™ i5-10400F pana la 4.30GHz, 16GB DDR4, 1TB SSD M.2 PCIe, GeForce® GTX 1660 Super™ 6GB GDDR6, No OS" data-url="/sistem-desktop-pc-gaming-serioux-powered-by-asus-cu-procesor-intelr-coretm-i5-10400f-pana-la-4-30ghz-16gb-ddr4-1tb-ssd-m-2-pcie-geforcer-gtx-1660-supertm-6gb-gddr6-no-os-srx-5949088514005/pd/D32BFKMBM/?ref=profiled_categories_m_home_3_1&amp;provider=rec&amp;recid=rec_50_7fb4fc67f4a04a2e737022f89c7f823f5094375eb9c524eb94f675e6364f700a_1621333566&amp;scenario_ID=50" data-product-id="36464311" data-offer-id="7998286"><div class="product-badge-box js-product-badge-box "><div class="js-product-unified-badges"><div class="product-badge-container js-product-badge-container" data-product-type="discount">

                        </div></div>
